content.raw:
Thanks for the tutorial, @meha27 !

I pulled it in an made some changes to the manifest. Each tutorial needs a unique reference, and the proper path to its directory. Also, the convention is to have directory names lower cased. You should be able to update this tutorial by pulling from the osrf repo.

Here's a preview:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?branch=Joints&tut=joints
content.html:
Thanks for the tutorial, @meha27 !

I pulled it in an made some changes to the manifest. Each tutorial needs a unique reference, and the proper path to its directory. Also, the convention is to have directory names lower cased. You should be able to update this tutorial by pulling from the osrf repo.

Here's a preview:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?branch=Joints&tut=joints
